name: Python
description: An interpreted, high-level, general-purpose programming language known for its readability and versatility. Python supports multiple programming paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming.

name: C#
description: A general-purpose, multi-paradigm programming language developed by Microsoft. C# encompasses static typing, strong typing, lexically scoped, imperative, declarative, functional, generic, object-oriented, and component-oriented programming disciplines.
